title: How to Know Who's a Slasher on The N's Slasher Game

steps.headline: Pay attention and always be playing.
steps.description: At night you can go do something else but you must come back when it's day! (In-game day and night.)

steps.headline: Act like a plain ol' camper, not a special role or slasher!
steps.description: Acting mysterious or strange will automatically get people to kill or eliminate you. Also, when ANYBODY private messages you or whatever asking you what your role is, say you are a camper. Make sure you sure SOUND like it! You can watch other campers do the same and copy their methods if they are doing really good.

steps.headline: Don't trust anyone!
steps.description: If someone asks who you are, just say you're a camper and that's it. Say it's pretty boring and don't let them try to drag anything else out of you!

steps.headline: Don't tell ANYBODY who the slashers are if you know.
steps.description: Only tell the ones that FOR SURE are campers and you have real proof/reasonable reasons to back that up!

steps.headline: Don't lie to yourself.
steps.description: You can lie to all the other players, though!

steps.headline: Watch closely who's on and who's not.
steps.description: Are some people on for a while at night and then go off or stay on and then at day, they leave? That's most likely a slasher! Is anyone on the entire time but aren't talking, especially during the day but might be only private messaging SOME people? They're probably slashers!

steps.headline: Don't reveal any personal info or slashers may slash you next!
Don't say you know who the slasher is or you think you know who is/have clues.
steps.description: The slashers will tell each other you know too much and they'll kill you off! So whenever you are going to tell people stuff like that and you're sure the slashers are going to kill you, have the cop protect you! Don't know who the cop is? You can ask others!

steps.headline: Listen to others and not majority.
steps.description: Only do majority voting (vote for the person with the most votes so far) when people (larger amount of campers than slashers left) have good enough back-up/evidence!

steps.headline: Don't give up!
steps.description: This makes you a good victim to kill off for the slashers!

steps.headline: If you don't know who might be a slasher, try killing off a person that's always been offline.
steps.description: This works, too, because sometimes all the other slashers are dead already and every night nobody's been attempted to be killed. Eliminate all the offline people, then!

steps.headline: Also, if 2-4 people are blaming other people a LOT, they are most likely slashers trying to protect themselves.
You can't be the reporter/slasher or this will not work!
Zoom in to 400% and scroll down, right, up, left, whichever directions until you find the game.
You should see the slasher chat box!
steps.description: Don't click to go to "Normal Chat", though, or the cheat will stop working.

steps.headline: You might be saying, "But how will I know who's talking?"
steps.description: Well... you'll get to see their names! You might not find all of the slashers, though, because one or two might not be chatting there.

steps.headline: Make sure the cop protects you for the best, safest results!
Following ALL of these steps EXACTLY and accurately gives your team about a 98% chance to WIN!

text: Method 1 Pay attention and always be playing. At night you can go do something else but you must come back when it's day! (In-game day and night.) Act like a plain ol' camper, not a special role or slasher! Acting mysterious or strange will automatically get people to kill or eliminate you. Also, when ANYBODY private messages you or whatever asking you what your role is, say you are a camper. Make sure you sure SOUND like it! You can watch other campers do the same and copy their methods if they are doing really good. Don't trust anyone! If someone asks who you are, just say you're a camper and that's it. Say it's pretty boring and don't let them try to drag anything else out of you! Don't tell ANYBODY who the slashers are if you know. Only tell the ones that FOR SURE are campers and you have real proof/reasonable reasons to back that up! Don't lie to yourself. You can lie to all the other players, though! Watch closely who's on and who's not. Are some people on for a while at night and then go off or stay on and then at day, they leave? That's most likely a slasher! Is anyone on the entire time but aren't talking, especially during the day but might be only private messaging SOME people? They're probably slashers! Don't reveal any personal info or slashers may slash you next!  Don't say you know who the slasher is or you think you know who is/have clues. The slashers will tell each other you know too much and they'll kill you off! So whenever you are going to tell people stuff like that and you're sure the slashers are going to kill you, have the cop protect you! Don't know who the cop is? You can ask others! Listen to others and not majority. Only do majority voting (vote for the person with the most votes so far) when people (larger amount of campers than slashers left) have good enough back-up/evidence! Don't give up! This makes you a good victim to kill off for the slashers! If you don't know who might be a slasher, try killing off a person that's always been offline. This works, too, because sometimes all the other slashers are dead already and every night nobody's been attempted to be killed. Eliminate all the offline people, then! Also, if 2-4 people are blaming other people a LOT, they are most likely slashers trying to protect themselves.  Method 2: "The" Cheat You can't be the reporter/slasher or this will not work!  Zoom in to 400% and scroll down, right, up, left, whichever directions until you find the game.  You should see the slasher chat box! Don't click to go to "Normal Chat", though, or the cheat will stop working. You might be saying, "But how will I know who's talking?" Well... you'll get to see their names! You might not find all of the slashers, though, because one or two might not be chatting there. Make sure the cop protects you for the best, safest results!  Following ALL of these steps EXACTLY and accurately gives your team about a 98% chance to WIN!
